# compassVisibility

**Instance Property**

The visibility of the compass button.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var compassVisibility: MKFeatureVisibility { get set }
```

## Discussion

You can configure a compass button to be visible all the time or only when the compass heading changes.

## Getting the compass attributes

- **mapView**: The map view that provides the heading information for the compass button.
- **MKFeatureVisibility**: Constants that indicate the visibility of different map features.
